      • addClass

        public boolean addClass(Class<?> glueClass)
        Description copied from interface: ObjectFactory
        Collects glue classes in the classpath. Called once on init.
        Specified by:
        addClass in interface ObjectFactory
        Parameters:
        glueClass - Glue class containing cucumber.api annotations (Before, Given, When, ...)
        Returns:
        true if stepdefs and hooks in this class should be used, false if they should be ignored.

      • getInstance

        public <T> T getInstance(Class<T> glueClass)
        Description copied from interface: ObjectFactory
        Provides the glue instances used to execute the current scenario. The instance can be prepared in ObjectFactory.start().
        Specified by:
        getInstance in interface ObjectFactory
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of Glue class
        Parameters:
        glueClass - type of instance to be created.
        Returns:
        new Glue instance of type T
